name: Web UI
body: Web UI documentation and demo website.

name: Erik Gassler
body: Bio website for Erik Gassler (Visit me on [YouTube](https://youtu.be/IVPHtC0H2fU)), owner of Stoic dreams, and author of [the book CASE: Continuous Agile Software Engineering](https://a.co/d/3da8fQc).

name: Software Development Standards
body: Additional documentation for Continuous Agile Software Engineering methodologies and related practices.

name: My Fidelity Services
body: Documentation and services portal for API and content delivery services provide by Stoic Dreams.

name: My Fidelity CDN
body: Host for static content delivery - including all Web UI web component files, website developed using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and development stage for new Web UI components.

name: Gassler Design
body: Company website for Gassler Design. An interior decorating company that specializes in 3d renderings.

name: Task Proxy
body: Task Proxy is our desktop application that is being designed to allow developers to manage code documenation and scripts, speed up workflows, and simplify collaboration with other developers.

name: Task Story
body: Task Story is our Project Management tool that provides a guided workflow to organize projects with a Problem / Solution architecture.

name: Did You Hear About This Job?
body:
Job Search resources and tips.

Currently rebuilding as part of migration to Web UI.
